pageProduct.name: White Glo Charcoal Travellers Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Travellers Pack with new Charocal Deep Stain Remover Toothpaste. Easy to carry with you at the office, on holidays or leave at your desk.

Warnings

In case of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. Children under the age of 6 may use under the instruction of a dentist only if deemed necessary and safe.

Common Uses

Oral Care, Teeth whitening

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Aqua, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Silica, Aroma, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Carboxymethyl, hydroxyethylcellulose, Chondrus Crispus, Charcoal Powder, Titanium dioxide, Sodium Saccharin, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sodium Monofluorophosphate

Directions

Brush daily twice a day for 2 minutes.
